item.title: Leaf Node Monitoring v2025.01 released with Import/Export and Connectivity Check
item.description: I'm pleased to announce the next version of Leaf Node Monitoring, the simple and easy to use open source site and server monitoring tool. This update adds two features users have requested, plus a couple of small but useful fixes. This post goes over everything that is new in this release.
